original_text:
Blirix Workshop
Se siete amanti del genere Steampunk, allora questa è la slot che fa per voi. Per chi non lo sapesse, lo Steampunk è una corrente letteraria di genere fantasy o meglio fantascientifica ambientata nel 1.800. Il protagonista di questa slot è infatti un giovane scienziato con i capelli biondi sparati verso l’alto e vestito come un aviatore del secolo scorso. La grafica neanche a dirlo è eccezionale, lo stile è quello dei cartoni animati e ci sono tantissime animazioni. L’ambientazione è un laboratorio, in risalto provette messe a bollire, ciotole con dentro liquidi fluorescenti e una libreria su cui capeggia un teschio umano. Su una mensola c’è un topo che ci fissa incuriosito, muovendo la testa e socchiudendo gli occhi di tanto in tanto. Sulla poltrona c’è un gatto addormentato anch’esso dotato di vita propria! Un calderone al centro della stanza proietta in alto la nostra griglia di gioco. Ecco, se dovessimo definire la grafica di Blirix Workshop useremo senz’altro il termine «stupefacente»!
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di gioco è una classica 5×3 con 20 linee di pagamento e una scommessa minima di 0,20 €. Si possono impostare tra i 5 e i 99 giri automatici, con alcuni limiti di vincita o di perdita.
La volatilità è alta, il valore RTP è del 96,1%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Sono tantissime le funzionalità di Blirix Workshop. Cominciamo con una panoramica sui simboli: fiori, quadri, cuori e picche sono i simboli che valgono meno in assoluto, a seguire troviamo la lanterna, la clessidra, il catino con la pozione verde e per concludere la pipa avvolta dai tentacoli.
Il simbolo Wild è la pianta carnivora, sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne quelli speciali e se atterra nella linea inferiore si espande per tutto il rullo.
Un secondo Wild è il libro delle pozioni. Oltre a fungere da Jolly ha la particolarità di lanciare incantesimi. Durante il gioco normale avremo uno di 4 incantesimi di base:

Moltiplicatore di vincite: assegna un moltiplicatore x2, x3, x4.
Tempesta di mosche gialle: un numero variabile di mosche gialle atterra sui rulli e trasforma i simboli in Wild
Tempesta di mosche viola: un numero variabile di mosche viola atterra sui rulli e trasforma tutti i simboli in quello selezionato
Aggiunta Wild: aggiunge un numero variabile di Wild

Il nostro esploratore è lo Scatter e in base al numero di simboli ci ricompensa con 10, 15 o 20 Free Spins.
A ogni giro gratuito 3 simboli vengono fatti cadere nel calderone e dopo 5 giri avremo una ricompensa.
Se compare il libro durante i Free Spins usufruiremo di un incantesimo avanzato:

Swap calderone: i simboli di basso valore vengono trasformati in simboli maggiormente remunerativi
Swap calderone Wild: un simbolo di basso livello viene trasformato in Wild
Giro gratis aggiuntivo: assegna ulteriori 5 giri gratis
Moltiplicatore globale: aumenta il moltiplicatore di 1

raw_translation.response:
Blirix Workshop
If you're a fan of Steampunk, then this is the slot for you. The graphics are exceptional, with a cartoon style and lots of animations. The setting is a laboratory, with bubbling test tubes, bowls of fluorescent liquids, and a bookcase featuring a human skull. The gameplay is a classic 5x3 with 20 paylines and a minimum bet of €0.20. The volatility is high, with an RTP value of 96.1%. The Wild symbol is a carnivorous plant that substitutes for all symbols except special ones and expands to fill the entire reel. Another Wild is the book of potions, which launches spells. The explorer is the Scatter, rewarding us with 10, 15, or 20 Free Spins based on the number of symbols. During the Free Spins, three symbols are dropped into the cauldron, and after five spins, we'll receive a reward. If the book appears during the Free Spins, we'll enjoy an advanced spell, such as swapping low-value symbols for higher-paying ones or adding extra free spins. The graphics are simply stunning, and the gameplay is packed with features to keep even the most experienced gamblers entertained.

The volatility is high, with an RTP value of 96.1%. The Wild symbol is a carnivorous plant that substitutes for all symbols except special ones and expands to fill the entire reel. Another Wild is the book of potions, which launches spells. The explorer is the Scatter, rewarding us with 10, 15, or 20 Free Spins based on the number of symbols. raw_translation.response:
Blirix Workshop is a slot game that will transport you into the fantastical world of Steampunk. With its vibrant graphics and incredible attention to detail, the game immerses you in a world of adventure and discovery. The protagonist of the game is a young scientist, with blonde hair and dressed like an aviator from the last century. The setting is his laboratory, filled with bubbling test tubes, bowls of fluorescent liquid, and a library with a human skull on top. The graphics are incredible, with animations that bring the world to life.

The game features a 5x3 reel layout, with 20 paylines and a minimum bet of 0.20 €. You can set between 5 and 99 automatic spins, with some limits on winnings and losses. The volatility is high, and the RTP is 96.1%.

There are many symbols and features in Blirix Workshop. The symbols include flowers, diamonds, hearts, and spades, with lanterns, hourglasses, and green potions being more valuable. The wild symbol is a carnivorous plant that expands to cover the entire reel. A second wild is the book of potions, which launches spells during normal gameplay. These spells include win multipliers, wild transformations, and more.

The explorer is the scatter symbol, and landing enough of them can earn you free spins. During each free spin, three symbols are added to the cauldron, with a reward given after five spins. Landing the book during free spins activates an advanced spell, including swapping low-value symbols for higher ones, adding extra spins, and increasing global multipliers.

Overall, Blirix Workshop is an extraordinary game that will provide hours of entertainment and excitement. Its Steampunk setting and stunning graphics make it a must-play for experienced gamblers looking for something different.

message.content:
Blirix Workshop is a slot game that will transport you into the fantastical world of Steampunk. With its vibrant graphics and incredible attention to detail, the game immerses you in a world of adventure and discovery. The protagonist of the game is a young scientist, with blonde hair and dressed like an aviator from the last century. The setting is his laboratory, filled with bubbling test tubes, bowls of fluorescent liquid, and a library with a human skull on top. The graphics are incredible, with animations that bring the world to life.

The game features a 5x3 reel layout, with 20 paylines and a minimum bet of 0.20 €. You can set between 5 and 99 automatic spins, with some limits on winnings and losses. The volatility is high, and the RTP is 96.1%.

There are many symbols and features in Blirix Workshop. The symbols include flowers, diamonds, hearts, and spades, with lanterns, hourglasses, and green potions being more valuable. The wild symbol is a carnivorous plant that expands to cover the entire reel. A second wild is the book of potions, which launches spells during normal gameplay. These spells include win multipliers, wild transformations, and more.

The explorer is the scatter symbol, and landing enough of them can earn you free spins. During each free spin, three symbols are added to the cauldron, with a reward given after five spins. Landing the book during free spins activates an advanced spell, including swapping low-value symbols for higher ones, adding extra spins, and increasing global multipliers.

Overall, Blirix Workshop is an extraordinary game that will provide hours of entertainment and excitement. Its Steampunk setting and stunning graphics make it a must-play for experienced gamblers looking for something different.

Review: Blirix Workshop is a slot game that will transport you into the fantastical world of Steampunk. With its vibrant graphics and incredible attention to detail, the game immerses you in a world of adventure and discovery. The protagonist of the game is a young scientist, with blonde hair and dressed like an aviator from the last century. The setting is his laboratory, filled with bubbling test tubes, bowls of fluorescent liquid, and a library with a human skull on top. The graphics are incredible, with animations that bring the world to life.

The game features a 5x3 reel layout, with 20 paylines and a minimum bet of 0.20 €. You can set between 5 and 99 automatic spins, with some limits on winnings and losses. The volatility is high, and the RTP is 96.1%.

There are many symbols and features in Blirix Workshop. The symbols include flowers, diamonds, hearts, and spades, with lanterns, hourglasses, and green potions being more valuable. The wild symbol is a carnivorous plant that expands to cover the entire reel. A second wild is the book of potions, which launches spells during normal gameplay. These spells include win multipliers, wild transformations, and more.

The explorer is the scatter symbol, and landing enough of them can earn you free spins. During each free spin, three symbols are added to the cauldron, with a reward given after five spins. Landing the book during free spins activates an advanced spell, including swapping low-value symbols for higher ones, adding extra spins, and increasing global multipliers.

Overall, Blirix Workshop is an extraordinary game that will provide hours of entertainment and excitement. Its Steampunk setting and stunning graphics make it a must-play for experienced gamblers looking for something different.

In the game of Blirix Workshop, you will also find a scatter symbol represented by an explorer. When you land enough of them, you will unleash free spins. Review:
 
Gameplay and Features

Blirix Workshop has a 5x3 reel layout, with 20 paylines and a minimum bet of 0.20 €. The game offers 5 to 99 automatic spins, with win and loss limits. The game features high volatility, and the RTP is 96.1%. There are many symbols, including low-value symbols such as flowers, diamonds, hearts, and spades, and high-value symbols such as lanterns, hourglasses, and green potions. The game also features two wild symbols: a carnivorous plant and a book of potions that launch spells during normal gameplay. Lastly, the game has a scatter symbol, the explorer, which when landed in sufficient numbers triggers free spins.

Symbols and Wilds

The game features various symbols, including low-value symbols represented by flowers, diamonds, hearts, and spades. High-value symbols include lanterns, hourglasses, and green potions. The game also features two wild symbols: a carnivorous plant that expands to cover the entire reel and the book of potions that launches spells during normal gameplay. Additionally, the scatter symbol, represented by an explorer, triggers free spins when landed in sufficient numbers.

Setting and Graphics

Blirix Workshop has an impressive Steampunk setting that creates a fantastic world of adventure and discovery. The game immerses you in the protagonist's laboratory filled with bubbling test tubes, bowls of fluorescent liquid, and a library with a human skull on top. The protagonist is a young scientist with blonde hair and dressed like an aviator from the last century. The graphics are incredible, with animations that bring the world to life, creating a captivating gaming experience.

Volatility and RTP

Blirix Workshop offers players a high volatility game with an RTP of 96.1%. High volatility means players are likely to experience infrequent but significant wins. The game also features a twenty pay line reel layout and a minimum bet of 0.20 €. Auto spins are available, with limitations on winnings and losses for a seamless gaming experience.

Free Spins and Bonus Features

Blirix Workshop rewards players with free spins when they land three or more scatter symbols (the explorer). During each free spin, three symbols are added to the cauldron, and a reward is given after completing five spins. Players can activate the advanced spells when landing the book of potions during free spins, including swapping low-value symbols for higher ones, increasing global multipliers, and adding extra spins to the game.

The RTP indicates that the game pays out 96.1% of the revenue it generates as winnings to players over its lifetime, making it a fair game that rewards players.

Review: Blirix Workshop is a slot game that will transport you into the fantastical world of Steampunk. With its vibrant graphics and incredible attention to detail, the game immerses you in a world of adventure and discovery. The protagonist of the game is a young scientist, with blonde hair and dressed like an aviator from the last century. The setting is his laboratory, filled with bubbling test tubes, bowls of fluorescent liquid, and a library with a human skull on top. The graphics are incredible, with animations that bring the world to life.

The game features a 5x3 reel layout, with 20 paylines and a minimum bet of 0.20 €. You can set between 5 and 99 automatic spins, with some limits on winnings and losses. The volatility is high, and the RTP is 96.1%.

There are many symbols and features in Blirix Workshop. The symbols include flowers, diamonds, hearts, and spades, with lanterns, hourglasses, and green potions being more valuable. The wild symbol is a carnivorous plant that expands to cover the entire reel. A second wild is the book of potions, which launches spells during normal gameplay. These spells include win multipliers, wild transformations, and more.

The explorer is the scatter symbol, and landing enough of them can earn you free spins. During each free spin, three symbols are added to the cauldron, with a reward given after five spins. Landing the book during free spins activates an advanced spell, including swapping low-value symbols for higher ones, adding extra spins, and increasing global multipliers.

Overall, Blirix Workshop is an extraordinary game that will provide hours of entertainment and excitement. Its Steampunk setting and stunning graphics make it a must-play for experienced gamblers looking for something different.
